summary.overallFindings: Cencora demonstrates comprehensive responsible AI practices across all seven pillars, with detailed evidence supporting transparency, fairness, explainability, and governance. The company's ESG reports, technical whitepapers, and public commitments reflect a mature approach to AI ethics, privacy, and accountability. No significant gaps were identified, and external audits further validate their practices. Overall, Cencora meets or exceeds expectations in all areas of responsible AI.
